text:
Question regarding blog templates and the data that is included in a blog RSS feed.
We have a blog that does not use the typical content.post_body module for the "meat" of the article. The article itself is written and controlled in a custom module. This results in the RSS feed not picking up the article preview up to the <-- more --> tag.
Any idea how we can get the preview/description to get properly pulled?
You can perhaps create a separate RSS feed of your blog with the regular RSS syntaxes?

Hey there!  does anyone know if its possible to have to separate domain/content in one HubSpot account. For example <http://example1.com|example1.com> and <http://example2.com|example2.com> are going to have different contents, can this be done and managed with one HubSpot account?
